p: The coconut milk was obtained according to the protocols outlined by Neela and Prasad ( 2012). The VCO extracted using integrated wet processes was performed according to reported procedures (Nur Arbainah, 2012) with slight modifications. The solid endosperm of mature coconut was de‚Äêhusked, collected, and grated. The water from the inner cavity was disposed. It was then squeezed and filtered through cheesecloth to obtain the coconut milk.
